metadata.title: CVE-2021-25631 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the LibreOffice 7-1 series in versions prior to 7.1.2, and in the 7-0series in versions prior to 7.0.5, the denylist can be circumvented bymanipulating the link so it doesn't match the denylist but results inShellExecute attempting to launch an executable type.

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
